name: Vector Demo
description:
VECTOR DEMO

This Vector demo is a simple program I use to demonstrate why we need and how we use vectors in game development. It's just a neat thing to watch and playing with the variables in the code on PICO-8 can produce some interest results.

Please donate or purchase the .p8 file below! I use any proceeds to help support my efforts to teach school kids how to make video games  while introducing key concepts in math and computer science.
